altername_name: Metal Fight Beyblade: Explode! Cyber Pegasis
Metal Fight Beyblade: Bakutan Cyber Pegasus
Metal Fight Beyblade: Bakutan! Cyber Pegasis
name: Beyblade: Metal Fusion
overview: Gingka Hagane, along with his Storm Pegasus, has entered himself in the "Nosferatu Boy Beyblading Tournament". However, this tournament is mysterious because when Bladers lose their matches, they find themselves drained of energy and unable to get off the ground. Gingka is enraged by this idea for Beyblading and resolves to find the mad villain responsible for this and bring him/her to justice.
